title: ADC's that are good (Mostly considering Urgot and Vayne)
body: Which adc should i choose, urgot or Vayne?

replies.body:
I think you should consider AD Lux.
She broken.

Vayne require an excel mechanic to play, she has been out of use in more recent patches, but she was extremely strong in the past.
Urgot have been a deny against enemy ADC since the beginning of time, not much have happened to him, realistically speaking, he needs to be buffed.

I think both should be buffed by rito, as they are falling behind in some aspects, but they are still viable.

Urgot has some pretty bad range. No one plays him, but that isn't necessarily an indication of his viability. He can work quite well. My friend plays him top, and has even gone legendary as him. For bot lane though, Vayne is probably more viable,
please vote, im stuck between the two
